title: System Configurator User
para: This chapter is an overview of DeStar possible actions for the System Configurator User.

You can define virtual PBXs, interfaces to the telephone company or VOIP-Provider, create phones, fiddle with options and create other users. You also have access to reports, call details and the operator panel.

sect1.title: Configuration Menu
sect1.para: On this menu you can see some configuration tips to help you finish DeStar installation and you can access the various groups of configlets you can configure.

When you finish creation and edition of your configuration objects, you have to save and apply your configuration (see ). If you want, you can edit the main configuration file destar_cfg.py directly and use destar in 'backend mode' (see man page for details).
DeStar source code includes some example destar_cfg.py configuration files, and the community contributed wiki has some custom configurations for common situations.

sect1.title: Administration Menu
sect1.para: On this menu you can perform administrative actions to the PBX system, incluiding saving and applying changes.
